title: Succinic semialdehyde derived from the gut microbiota can promote the proliferation of adult T-cell leukemia/lymphoma cells
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Nodoka Chiba, Shinya Suzuki, Daniel Enriquez-Vera, Atae Utsunomiya, Yoko Kubuki, Tomonori Hidaka, Kazuya Shimoda, Shingo Nakahata, Takuji Yamada, Kazuhiro Morishita
